original_title: South Carolina Chicken Bog: The Chicken Bog King of the Pee Dee
overview: What is Chicken bog? Folks in surrounding states are likely to give you a blank stare if you mention it. Chicken bog is a delicious chicken, rice and sausage dish, and it’s very much a South Carolina thing. Specifically, chicken bog is most popular in Horry County, the home of Myrtle Beach and Conway and west to Florence. It’s closely related to chicken pilau (or pilaf or perlo), except that it’s … well, boggier.
title: South Carolina Chicken Bog: The Chicken Bog King of the Pee Dee
